title: Credit funds, family offices fill void left by banks at AIFs
description: The central bank came out with a circular in December 2023, requiring mainstream banks and NBFCs to divest their investments in AIFs that have funded any company that has borrowed from the bank or NBFC. The regulator had also raised provisions for banks or NBFCs investing in AIFs that subsequently lend to their borrowing companies.
